PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Product Discovery App
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app helps you discover new and innovative products across various categories like tech, home, lifestyle and more. Whether you're looking for the latest gadgets or unique items for your home, our app curates and showcases the best new products on the market.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How does the product discovery process work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Our team of product experts continuously searches for and vets new product launches. We evaluate products based on factors like innovation, usefulness, quality and customer reviews. The top-rated products get featured on our app for you to explore.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I filter products by category or price range?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, absolutely. Our app allows you to filter products based on categories like electronics, home & kitchen, beauty, and more. You can also set price ranges to only see products that fit your budget.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: How can I purchase products through the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: While our app does not directly sell products, each product listing contains a link to purchase from the brand's website or popular online retailers. Simply tap on the 'Buy Now' button to be redirected to complete your purchase.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Stay ahead of the curve with our curated selection of new and exciting products across various categories.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to commonly asked questions about our product discovery app.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app is designed to help you find and explore new products in various categories, from technology to fashion and beyond. With personalized recommendations and extensive search filters, you can easily discover items that match your interests and preferences.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How does the product discovery process work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Our app uses advanced algorithms and machine learning to analyze your browsing history, preferences, and other data to provide tailored product suggestions. You can also search for specific products, brands, or categories to narrow down your options.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I save my favorite products?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Absolutely! Our app allows you to create a personalized wishlist or favorites list to save products you're interested in for future reference or purchase.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How often is the product catalog updated?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Our product catalog is updated regularly to ensure you have access to the latest and most popular products on the market. New items are added daily, so you'll always have fresh options to explore.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is the app available on multiple platforms?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, our product discovery app is available for both iOS and Android devices, as well as a web-based version that can be accessed from any modern web browser.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Stay Ahead of the Curve with Our Cutting-Edge Product Finder
FEATURE_1_BODY: Explore a vast marketplace of cutting-edge products from emerging brands and innovative startups. Find unique items you won't see anywhere else.

FEATURE_3_BODY: Be among the first to know about exciting new product launches from up-and-coming brands. Get early bird discounts and limited edition items.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our trend analysis. Identify emerging product categories and designs before they hit the mainstream.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Read authentic reviews from our community of early adopters. Get unbiased insights to help you make informed purchase decisions.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Access special collections and limited runs through our partnerships with innovative product makers and designers.
